thread.section_title: Innside New York Nomad - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very disappointing
thread.title_full: Very disappointing - Review of Innside New York Nomad, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Y2372XSsandral
title: Very disappointing
text: Very expensive for what it is. Room service was terrible, the food was awful. They charge you 5$ for every order (not including tip). Internet was very slow (and probably because they want you to pay the extra to get "high speed" internet). I was charged an extra 20$usd/day (that was not included in my initial invoice) for "facility fee". And finally I didn't like the location, a bit of a sketchy neighbourhood. In summary: i don't recommend it.
